website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for bigger kids and Nerf enthusiasts who are ready to try something different than the brand's classic bow and arrow sets.
pros: Features a crossbow design that sends arrows a decent distance with pretty good accuracy
Has on-board arrow storage so arrows are easy for kids to reach when they're ready to reload
Price falls on the low end of the spectrum
cons: Arrows are somewhat challenging to load
Forceful shooting action isn't ideal for small kids

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!!
customer_reviews.text: While this bow looks cute, the speed and force with which the arrows come out is AMAZING. They will travel the length of the house! If a kid or grownup gets hit in the eye, he WILL lose it! VERY, VERY DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.author: Subman

customer_reviews.title: This is the best nerf gun!!! Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing! I just got it! The arrows shoot very far and the crossbow is very accurate. The arrows hold together well, and whistle when you shoot them. The crossbow itself is made well, and is very sturdy. The string is firm and does not break easily. Even though it takes a few seconds to load, it is one of the best Nerf Guns I have so far! You will not regret buying this item!
customer_reviews.author: One of 4

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bow from nerf. Buy over dreadbolt!
customer_reviews.text: This this is crazy fun to shoot. You do need to have a new ammo type that is arguably expensive though. You can't mod this blaster easily, as it is a legitimate string powered bow. My 8yo son and my 33 yo selfish both enjoy it. 8n qno5hwr note, dont buy 5he crappy dreadbolt over this. I5 may oook bigger and badder, but performance is worse. Just get this and enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: Nerf's Most Compact Bow?
customer_reviews.text: For anyone trying to decide between this and the Dreadbolt, I say go with this one. The Dreadbolt certainly looks more impressive, but the Wrathbolt has the same functionality in a much smaller size. Still, since it's a bow, this is more of a blaster to play with outside a Nerf battle. It's fun for target practice since toy bows aren't exactly the most accurate. It's an extra challenge. Some might find it tedious to load and cock the blaster, but I find it all right. The click when the arrow is in place is satisfying. It's a fun little toy to shoot around the home. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought my boys, 6 & 8, these for their birthdays. They absolutely love them and they’ve held up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did you want the dreadbolt to be better? Here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, sturdy, good size, shoots a good long distance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a prop in a play. We're really enjoying it. It's a great size for single handed shooting, The arrows really shoot a long distance. I was hoping the actors would be able to catch them during their scenes, but in close quarters, they just shoot too fast and far. So, we're having the actress shoot offstage, while the other actor hides one of the arrows and with a little sleight of and, brings it out. It's working out great, and like the rubberband gun I purchased, I have actors running around the theatre shooting at each other. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Its simple and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very great. The arrows shot kinda slow, and does compete with Nerf's Elite toy line. But it is a very fun toy to mess around with. If you like what you see in the picture and your thinking about getting it, then get it. Its simple and cheap. For more information go to the link below: nerf.wikia.com/wiki/Wrathbolt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate...far reaching...LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that could shoot far, about 30 feet , to scare away squirrels from my bird feeder (not hurt them). I’ve got to be pretty careful, I’m a good shot and this thing is crazy accurate. Plus it shoots so far, I almost went over the fence about 80 feet away, on my first shot! Super fun to play with, love the accuracy, ordered the four pack of refills. Love it! Now having said that, I would think twice before ordering this for very small children. I haven’t tested it, but I would imagine the arrow could hurt or give a blackeye if shot in close proximity.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!!! My 9 yr old got them for Christmas-we got 2- and they work great!! They shoot far and fast and they whistle, which is fun. ** the arrows hurt/sting pretty bad when you get hit....way worse than a nerf mega or regular dart. I wouldn’t recommend them for small children and do not shoot close up!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Love nerf!
customer_reviews.text: I like this nerf a lot. It’s different from the others but great for pretend play. I was afraid the arrows would take some work to get them into the bow just right but my 5 year old does it fine. They do have some force!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Richard

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, will sting of hit!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his father love these things. I will warn you that they do sting a bit if you’re hit by the arrows. This thing shoots much faster and harder than the regular nerf guns. So, I suggest you do your best to not get shot. It will sting. I also suggest buying extra arrows. Having four is a pretty decent amount but two doesn’t quite seem like enough. Granted, my son, his father and I all battle with these. So, if you’re not planning on battling, two arrows might be enough.
customer_reviews.author: arevans

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son bought it with his allowance, it's currently "the greatest thing ever" in the house - they have a ton of nerf guns but apparently this one is cooler... It only comes with two arrows, he doesn't seem to care and bought a 4pk to go with it. (If you don't mind purple and pink arrows they're exactly the same and about half the price.)
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Shoots far
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son during Christmas. I will say that he absolutely loves it. My only concern which is not really complaint is that it shoots really really far. We have tall grass in our backyard and when he shoots the arrows go so far that he spends about 2-3 min just looking for the arrow. I would definitely buy extra arrows to go with it but other than that I would totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LB87

customer_reviews.title: Looks like fun
customer_reviews.text: Havent seen it in use yet, it's a birthday gift. Excited to see what it is capable of doing. Looks like it'll be fun. I did not order the frustration free package and everything was fine. It was just in its original box, I don't know the difference on that. Shipping was super fast and got here earlier that expected. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Broke first night
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old son was playing with it and the rope that you pull back broke :( he was really bummed to say the least. Good idea of a toy, poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Beware product may cause sibling wars.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s birthday. He loved it. His sisters not so much. He has had this for 8 months and it still works great and the whole family now has nerf guns. Nerf battles in the backyard with family are a must during this time.
customer_reviews.author: MommaInspired

customer_reviews.title: Crossbow this!
customer_reviews.text: This little crossbow is so freaking cool! It shoots arrows about 50/60 feet. Accurate around 30 feet and under. The arrows make a whispy sound when fired, which is really neat! Great for any age. Totally with the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Well made & pretty powerful for a toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful toy. At close range (5ft) it did sting a good bit when my son accidentally shot me in the thigh. Great for target practice but I would not recommend letting your kids shoot at each other with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J Cappuccio

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable item
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old loved this. The power behind it, is shocking. Great aim, not cheaply made and a unique item for this collection of “traditional” nerf guns. Very impressed. It’s endured a lot and still works fine. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME and POWERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! Grandson was excited as soon as he opened it and loaded it up (He’s 8 years old). He shot it the first time and we were all amazed at how far it shot and how powerful it is! This thing is impressive! Shoots more than 40 feet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly B

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loves this toy. Also, gives opportunity to teach firearm handling and safety at a very young age. We treat it like it is a real gun with close supervision. We set up boxes for him to shoot and knock over. So far, the crossbow seems to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nerf never disappoints. This is another well made nerf gun and looks easy to use for my six year old.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Harris

customer_reviews.title: This thing is deadly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bow but watch out. I am literally scared its going to break through some drywall if it gets shot too close, but man, this is my go to for Nerf wars. The arrows whistle. Run sucka!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful. Shoots the length of our home and still hits with force. In retrospect probably not the best gift for a 5 year old, but he loves it. I’d say it’s maybe more suited for 7-9 year olds
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Tons Of Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Nerf Zombie Strike Crossbow looks like tons of fun! The crossbow itself is perfect size for a small kid! It comes with 2 Nerf Arrows!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: arrows shoot far...just have to make sure they are not bent...the body of the arrow is thin so they do bend easily. At times loading can get a bit difficult for younger kids but as with any toy weapon, only older kids should use this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Zak J. Eichen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Nerf
customer_reviews.text: This bow seems like a great toy until you have it for about a week and the 2 arrows that come with it are bent. They bend easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best crossbow on the market
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Gift/toy my son loved it. just know it’s powerful and packs a punch. Highly encourage shooting at objects not people. Great Gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and my boys loved this. The orange rubber tips broke really quickly off of the arrows. They bend really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Thatonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. My grandson is crazy about any thing Nerf and has every Nerf gun out there. This was a nice change from just a regular gun. He LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This shoots with a lot more Force than I expected and could hurt someone. However, my eleven-year-old loves it of course.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Best “Harmless” Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, getting spare bolts is pretty easy, and necessary, his friends are less careful about retrieving them. (Could also make bolts with dowel rods and Nerf Rival rounds.)
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Shoots Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is easy for my kid to use and it shots very accurately. It is also very strong and fast, so beware anything made of glass!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessila

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old bought this with his Birthday money, he is very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: River2Lake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 8 year old love this! Easy to operate and great price. Warning... the bullets do hurt ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kristy F

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cheap, but I guess I should have expected that, due to the price. have to return....cheapo quality
customer_reviews.author: Jomamma

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is extremely pleased with this. Easy to use, accurate, great for all his imaginary adventures.
customer_reviews.author: KehlFamily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crossbow for 5+
customer_reviews.text: Great toy!! Very fast shipping and good packaging my son loves it! carries it everywhere and easy to use definitely recommend it for boys!
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Shoots far but it’s not quiet and made out of cheap plastic. You definitely can’t play rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact nerf toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is having a blast! Arrows do shoot far so caution!
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Great halloween addition
customer_reviews.text: My boy was a character from the walking dead. He seemed to dig this add on to his costume.
customer_reviews.author: William A. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Shoots straight
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it can kill Zombies, I'll update the review when we meet one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun, don’t shoot out your kids eye
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than you would imagine, but luckily the tip is soft and shock absorbent
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my nephew loves it! It's awesome :) would purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Better then dreadbolt and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Kid liked it, but barely uses it compared to the other z-strike line.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy for someone under 7
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew he just turned 7. It says not for children under 8 and now I know why. The bullets/arrows hurt like heck. Lol just be aware. It was a great gift tho they love it just dont play with someone younger. They will get hurt
customer_reviews.author: RhiRhi84

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Small and cumbersome to load. Kid got bored with it after 10 minutes. Only comes with 2 arrows. Not fun.
customer_reviews.author: KHarr

customer_reviews.title: Need to sell replacement arrows separately
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the gift but quickly broke the arrows and you can’t replace them without buying a whole new set up.
customer_reviews.author: Didi Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, cats don't.
customer_reviews.text: My kid bought this for himself out of his allowance money. It shoots at stuff. The cat runs when they hear it fire now.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyDuergar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and worked well for 24 hours. Both arrows have broken and it’s completely unusable. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It is easy to use and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome! It's got some power behind it for sure!!! Those arrows FLY for a long distance. Easy to put together too.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power behind that bow
customer_reviews.text: Way more power behind it than I expected. Son enjoys it but the house isnt the place to shoot and he already lost one to the tree monsters outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a relly cool crossbow pistol. It feels great in the hand.

customer_reviews.title: Yay crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! It shoots far- my son loves it

customer_reviews.title: awesome shooter
customer_reviews.text: my son love this nerf wrathbolt it's something different for him other than the other nerf guns i buy him

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Shoots far and was good for little and big kids.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome
customer_reviews.text: The velocity is much higher than you expect yet is incredibly safe thanks to the design of the impact absorbing arrows

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! But beware it shoots pretty hard!

customer_reviews.text: My son loves this crossbow but the arrows break easily.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVES this!!
customer_reviews.text: The item was just as promised, reasonably priced and shipped here FAST!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: My six year old absolutely loves this. It’s easy for him to pull back the draw string and it shoots with a fair amount of power.

customer_reviews.title: Great Range and Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 21 and only pulled this out to shoot the last cup at a beer tourney. I got it on my first try and impressed everyone watching while drenching my foes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Gurrieri

customer_reviews.title: A true crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome weapon if your looking for a cheap crossbow alternative. As far as nerf wars, wouldn’t recommend, medieval combat though? Definitely. Shoots far and with relative accuracy. Has a lot of power behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for children.
customer_reviews.text: This bow shoots way too hard. Could injure your child.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a hit
customer_reviews.text: Ehh. My kids weren’t very interested after the first use. Kind of difficult to get the arrows in. If you do buy it, you will want to get extra arrows for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Seems to stand up well to a couple young kids that are always hard on toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Great Nerf Gun
customer_reviews.text: It is so powerful for a the price of only 20 bucks. If one of your family members of friends like nerf guns, this is the gun to buy for them

customer_reviews.text: I am going to return the product. When I pull the trigger nothing happens.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift

customer_reviews.title: Very nice present for my 7 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: Although this was purchased as a Christmas gift for my 7 year old son, I feel that this is very age appropriate.

customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, it very fun to shoot. It is fun to load and it is pretty accurate. Also there is to little arrow holding things on the bottom

customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this toy/gun! Very dangerous!! And it is a piece of junk...........It kept jamming as I tried to reload it. I put this together for my 10 year old grandson and after trying it out and seeing how dangerous it could be; I decided NOT to give it to him.

product_meta.title: Nerf Zombie Strike Wrathbolt - Defend Against the Zombified Attackers with Your Sniper Crossbow - Load, Aim, and Fire the 2 Included Darts - Arrows Whistle When Fired - Ages 8 and Up, Play Safe
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe zombies are getting stronger, and so are the survivors battling them -- they’re inventing new battle gear and teaming up with other zombie fighters to keep striking back! When the defenders needs to strike with stealth, they can make their point with the Wrathbolt crossbow. This Zombie Strike crossbow fires arrows and works like a real crossbow. Nock the arrow on the string, then pull back and release to send an arrow slicing through the air to deliver a message that the defenders will fight every last zombie! Experience real crossbow action with the Wrathbolt crossbow that has built-in arrow storage and comes with 2 Zombie Strike foam-tipped arrows.

Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: KEEP THE ZOMBIES BACK - fire arrows from the Wrathbolt nerf crossbow to defend against the zombies. The nerf defenders must battle the zombies away from the citizens
AIMING PRACTICE - kids experience fun crossbow action as they load, aim, and fire this bow and arrow. Always wear protective eye gear when playing with nerf guns
READY TO FIGHT - you can store your nerf rival arrows in the built-in space on the crossbow to keep the nerf darts within reach for when zombies attack
INCLUDES 2 NERF ELITE ARROWS - crossbow set includes 2 Zombie Strike arrows that make a whistling sound when fired. Designed for children ages 8 and up
COLLECT THEM ALL - collect all the Nerf Zombie Strike Weapons (sold separately) and take down any zombie that comes you and your friends' way

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars552 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
